title: quarkus:update - provide xml snippets for BOM changes

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Description

`quarkus:update` provides info like this:
```
[INFO] Recommended Quarkus platform BOM updates:
[INFO] Add:    io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom:pom:2.7.5.Final
[INFO] Add:    io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-amazon-services-bom:pom:2.7.5.Final
```

For end user it would be nice to have pom.xml snippets to just copy&paste it. I was playing with projects which had just  quarkus bom and GAVs which were relocated and composing dependencyManagement section again and again was a bit of pain.

Please consider also providing xml snippets for BOM changes, something like:
```xml
            <dependency>
                <groupId>io.quarkus.platform</groupId>
                <artifactId>quarkus-bom</artifactId>
                <version>2.7.5.Final</version>
                <type>pom</type>
                <scope>import</scope>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>io.quarkus.platform</groupId>
                <artifactId>quarkus-amazon-services-bom</artifactId>
                <version>2.7.5.Final</version>
                <type>pom</type>
                <scope>import</scope>
            </dependency>
```
